title: Community Funds for Marketing?
body:
Should we use some of the community funds for marketing purposes over the next 30 days? Some influencers and Youtubers would accept Bomb in exchange for creating videos where they promote and talk positively about Bomb. The Bomb community fund wallet currently has 55,000+ Bomb.

It will be made clear with any influencer that we suggest they hold Bomb and don't immediately sell on the open market. The Bomb Board will do our best to negotiate and preserve the funds as much as possible. Reasonability will be considered; for example, a Youtuber with only 100,000 subscribers can not justifiably receive 3000+ Bomb for one video. Vote below.

This vote is only regarding the next 30 days. If "No" gets at least 50% of the vote, we will not use community funds for marketing. Otherwise, the highest voted option out of the 4 "Yes" options will be the winning vote.
choices: Yes - but only up to 5,000 Bomb
Yes - but only up to 2,500 Bomb
Yes - but only up to 1,500 Bomb
author: 0x4d6B93D4CcEDe0954DdC21212af2A8F143e2238E
